# kSystemSoundID_UserPreferredAlert

**Global Variable**

On the desktop, use this constant with the [doc://com.apple.audiotoolbox/documentation/AudioToolbox/AudioServicesPlayAlertSound(_:)] function to play the alert specified in the Sound preference pane.

## Declaration

```swift
var kSystemSoundID_UserPreferredAlert: SystemSoundID { get }
```

## Constants

- **kSystemSoundID_FlashScreen**: On the desktop, use this constant with the [doc://com.apple.audiotoolbox/documentation/AudioToolbox/AudioServicesPlayAlertSound(_:)] function to display a flash of light on the screen.
- **kUserPreferredAlert**: A deprecated sound identifier.
